features: GuideRails® Holistic Support System: Brooks' innovative technology supports your body in its natural motion path while keeping excess movement in check

Super soft cushioning : A reconstructed midsole with more DNA LOFT than ever before creates the ultimate softness underfoot without losing responsiveness or durability. An OrthoLite® sockliner provides premium step-in comfort
Plush fit: The engineered mesh upper enhances the fit while the comfortable feel of a plush interior liner surrounds your foot and moves and expands with your stride
Plush transitions: Full-length DNA LOFT through the midsole makes the move from heel to toe feel incredibly soft and smooth
